channel.title: Quick question (DQ)
channel.description:
Does anyone know which class handles the restriction of player movement when they are set to BUSY? Currently, I walk around while BUSY, whereas I should be unable to. Examples include being able to walk away from an ongoing conversation with an NPC.
Any help is appreciated.

item.title: Quick question (DQ)
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Unless you modified the walk request packet handler, your npc plugin is fucked up

Read full topic
